MS MCQs

    Design the data model of a report in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. Which one of the following options can’t be used as a column in a data item?

      A field in a table

      A variable

      A property of a table

      An expression

      A label that is not bound to a specific table


    2. Which property can be used so that data isn’t printed on a report for a parent data item if no child data exists?

      PrintOnlyIfDetail

      DataItemLink

      Table view

      Empty Display
